Class friendMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • friendMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class friendMonitor
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Multithreading monitoring: Creating a monitor thread per each friend These monitor threads will be run concurrently
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Oh Boon Eng, Shahrokh Shahi
